thread.title: First World Congress on Marxism Held at Peking University [2015-10-13] (PKU - Peking University)
thread.title_full: First World Congress on Marxism Held at Peking University [2015-10-13] (PKU - Peking University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: First World Congress on Marxism Held at Peking University [2015-10-13] (PKU - Peking University)
text: ( Source : PKU - Peking University ) The first-ever World Congress on Marxism was inaugurated at Peking University on October 10 . More than 400 scholars of Marxism and specialists of China studies from over 20 countries and regions attended
